This endpoint is used to add a new micro pension payment into the system.

  as={"h2"}

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"amount":{"description":"The amount of money being processed","type":"string","example":"20000"},"bVN":{"description":"customer's bank verfication number","type":"string","example":"123456789"},"branchName":{"description":"The name of the branch handling the transaction","type":"string","example":"Oba Akran"},"channelName":{"description":"The channel through which the transaction is made","type":"string","example":"Off"},"customerName":{"description":"the customer's name","type":"string","example":"Josh"},"customerPhoneNumber":{"description":"the customer's phone number","type":"string","example":"09039203845"},"dateofbirth":{"description":"the customer's date of birth","type":"string","format":"date","example":"1993-02-02"},"nIN":{"description":"The National Identification Number of the customer","type":"string","example":"4340459384"},"pfaaccount":{"description":"the account number of the Pension Fund Administrator","type":"string","example":"20382932823"},"pfaname":{"description":"The name of the Pension Fund Administrator","type":"string","example":"Josh"},"pmtperiod":{"description":"The payment period for the contribution","type":"string","example":2},"rsaPin":{"description":"The RSAPIN associated with the transaction","type":"string","example":"1203924948"},"transDate":{"description":"the date of the transaction","type":"string","format":"date","example":"2024-1-22"},"transactionID":{"description":"the transaction ID","type":"string","example":"de9ew0c943scw"},"transnarration":{"description":"the transaction's narration","type":"string","example":"Yeah"}}},"example":[{"amount":"2000","bVN":"212343435","branchName":"Oba Akran","channelName":"Off","customerName":"Josh","customerPhoneNumber":"09039203845","dateofbirth":"1993-02-02","nIN":"4340459384","pfaaccount":"20382932823","pfaname":"Josh","pmtperiod":"2","rsaPin":"1203924948","transDate":"2024-1-22","transactionID":"de9ew0c943scw","transnarration":"Yeah"}]},"examples":{"Add
